channel.title: 2012-9 on eoc.online - Insights & Resources for EOCs
channel.description: Recent content in 2012-9 on eoc.online - Insights & Resources for EOCs

item.title: So Much for Earthquake Independence
item.description: After April’s huge strike-slip earthquake, the USGS reiterated the one earthquake doesn’t jolt others (out of the region) into existence.

item.title: Free Quake App Released by Red Cross
item.description: Be ready for an earthquake with Earthquake by American Red Cross. Get notified when an earthquake occurs, prepare your family and home, find help and let others know you are safe even if the power is out – a must have for anyone who lives in an earthquake-prone area or has loved ones who do.

item.title: Record-Breaking 99 Disasters Declared in 2011
item.description: President Obama has declared 20 more disasters than in 2010 and 2 times the numbers declared by President George W. Bush in his first two years in the White House.

item.title: September is National Preparedness Month-- A Reminder to Check your Supplies for the winter storm season…
item.description: President Obama has proclaimed September as National Preparedness Month.

item.title: Study reveals melt welts dynamics inside larger earthquakes
item.description: U.S. seismologists at CA’s Scripps Institution of Oceanography have released a study indicating fault zones weaken in select locations shortly after a fault reaches an earthquake tipping point. This can then transform a smaller series of quakes into a large mega-quake.
